But wait, there's more! Get 384MB instead of 256MB RAM and increased disk space and bandwidth.

For new orders placed by December 5th only:

free upgrade to 384MB dedicated memory
free upgrade to 20GB RAID-10 disk space

free upgrade to 200GB Bandwidth
100 mbps port speed
1 dedicated IP
root access (self managed)
